summary: TRANSFER CASE HAS GONE BAD.  DODGE MISSED THE DIAGNOSIS AND SENT US BACK DRIVING UNTIL I WAS ABLE TO BRING IT BACK IN A APRIL (OVER A MONTH LATER).  WE HAVE CURRENTLY ABOUT 75,000 MILES ON OUR 2000 DURANGO.  THE TRANSFER CASE WENT BAD UNEXPECTEDLY AND UNTIMELY.  OUR WHEELS COULD HAVE LOCKED UP WHILE WE WERE DRIVING CAUSING SERIOUS INJURY TO US AND OTHERS.             *JB
